titleStmt.title: Two discourses concerning the divinity of Our Saviour whereunto are added some articles subscribed by all the French divines in or about London, in opposition to the Socinians / translated out of French.
titleStmt.author: La Mothe, Claude Grostête, sieur de, 1647-1713.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
